Author: isthised
Text: I had nine years before this relapse... now I have a few moths or weeks depending on whether you count starting treatment or completing my meals.

Author: yyyyy622
Text: How long have you been in recovery? Because I started recovery 6 years ago, gained a large amount of weight and then 2 years ago started losing it. So it took me 4 years to feel even slightly comfortable in dieting and getting better. Now I'm at a stable weight and would like to lose more, yet I still get triggered. Its still always a struggle not to go down the spiral. I have to catch myself all the time. It takes time. Im sure this is not what you wanted to hear but it's never going to be easy.
